price: Diles: "Nadie puede protegerme de Dios y no tengo refugio fuera de Él,
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَن يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٞ وَلَنۡ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qul innī lan yujīranī mina al-lahi aḥadun walan ajida min dūnihi mul'taḥadan
